title: Rogovaw
author: Rogovaw
created_time: November 05, 2022, 07:24:13 AMLast edit: August 05, 2023, 07:01:16 AM by Rogovaw

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: It looks like an announcement to me rather than a service. Even if this is a service, are you offering it in bitcoin? By the way, nice design on the ANN.

comments.author: Rogovaw
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on November 05, 2022, 05:50:28 PMIt looks like an announcement to me rather than a service. Even if this is a service, are you offering it in bitcoin? By the way, nice design on the ANN.Yes,Â  it's a service. We can sell it in BTC / USDT. We are using AI that collects social and market activity for thousands of cryptocurrencies, NFTs, and stocks and distills it into actionable intelligence. The information we using to shill other startups to be more effective than our competitors. We got a huge team and middle prices for shill. Thanks for the comment. I can tell you on what platform I made it in DM.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Rogovaw on November 13, 2022, 02:40:38 PMdaily upNice to see the announcement on this thread. It is good that you will research and contact them on behalf of the business who will make a deal with you. So, both the research and contact are being managed by you. In this case, the success rate should be good. Have you any website for the service? Also, have you completed any sites? If yes, then would you like to attach it to the website?

comments.author: Rogovaw
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on November 17, 2022, 04:17:51 AMQuote from: Rogovaw on November 13, 2022, 02:40:38 PMdaily upNice to see the announcement on this thread. It is good that you will research and contact them on behalf of the business who will make a deal with you. So, both the research and contact are being managed by you. In this case, the success rate should be good. Have you any website for the service? Also, have you completed any sites? If yes, then would you like to attach it to the website?Let me tell you more about our service: we're using the product "AI Social Intelligence tool for Twitter and other social media" to find engaged rate Influencers and Tweets etc. To make Guerilla marketing more effective. We use mass accounts, creating native advertisements and building organic traffic income from the most engaged audience resources. That is why our services will work better than anyone else.

comments.author: lets.trade
comments.body: Hi, we can discuss colaboration. We started ne project based on Ai technology. So we are looking for a new customers to our project.Could you help us with it?
